about_the_game:
Suddenly being trapped in the world of gal game, the main character, CHUNI has come up with a good way to escape.

If I ignore all the heroine characters in this game and focus only on my childhood friend (boy) MAYUMU, I should be able to return to my original world.

Will CHUNI, a boy with a crazy idea who has no interest in any of the heroin characters in the gal game, be able to safely return to his original world?

OUROBOROS IF-SERIES, THE FIRST VOLUME OF SHORT BL VISUAL NOVELS.

About

  • Genre：Visual novel

  • Character Voice：Part Voice（Japanese voice only）

Feature

  • You can fully immerse yourself in the decadent and pop-inspired world.

  • We plan to include the highly original theme song by OUROBOROS in the game.

  • You can experience the despair of being surrounded by cute female characters but only being able to be in a relationship with a boy.

  • A world devoid of ethics and conversation with venomous humor.

  • Nothing in particular. Everything is for CHUNI.

MAIN CHARACTER: MALE CHARACTER WHO IS THE ONLY TARGET TO BE IN A RELATIONSHIP.

  • CHUNI / チュウニ

Main character. A man with a wild idea. A laid-back personality and loved by everyone. Born on April 1. 170cm.

  • MAYUMU / マユム

He is CHUNI's only target, a man who is her childhood friend and best friend.He is a geek for erotic video games with cute girls. Born on June 10. 165 cm.

SUB-CHARACTERS: CUTE AND UNIQUE GIRLS.

*HOWEVER, CHUNI IS NOT INTERESTED IN GETTING A GIRLFRIEND, SO YOU CANNOT BE IN A RELATIONSHIP WITH THEM.

  • Producer・Story・Director：TSUYUBA MIDORI

  • Logo Design：ÐΛ𝕀︎Я✩⃝🅺Ц ⁶͙⁶͙⁶͙ @dairokuuu

  • Presented by

╭━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━╮

♥♥　IT'S ALL ABOUT CHUNI!　♥♥

╰━ｖ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━╯

THIS IS A WORLD FOR CHUNI, SO EVERYONE SHOULD FOCUS ONLY ON HIM! BUT THE FIRST VOLUME IS ABOUT MAYUMU AND CHUNI, SO I DON'T HAVE MUCH OF A ROLE IN THE GAME. I'M A LITTLE BIT JEALOUS OF THAT...... THIS IS A GAME THAT CAN BE ENJOYED FOR FREE ALL THE WAY THROUGH. HOWEVER, I'M SURE YOU ALL GET HAPPY WITH A FREE GAME AND FORGET TO PLAY IT EVEN AFTER ADDING IT TO YOUR WISH LIST/LIBRARY. NO. I HAVE A LOT OF FREE GAMES IN MY WISHLIST/LIBRARY, TOO. SO, I UNDERSTAND HOW YOU FEEL! OF COURSE, I DON'T MEAN TO BLAME THOSE WHO CALL THEMSELVES GAME LOVERS! YOU DON'T HAVE TO PUT THE GAME ON YOUR WISH LIST/LIBRARY! YOU JUST HAVE TO KNOW ABOUT CHUNI. YES, THAT'S ALL YOU NEED TO KNOW! THEN YOUR LIFE WILL BE WORTH LIVING! IT'S ALL ABOUT CHUNI!

I'M SORRY, I WAS SO EXCITED THAT I FORGOT TO TELL YOU...... MY NAME IS SAIAKU! IT'S A STRANGE NAME, ISN'T IT? I THINK SO TOO. I MAY APPEAR IN THE GAME SOMEDAY, SO PLEASE KEEP AN EYE OUT FOR ME! I'LL BE WATCHING YOU ALL FOR THE WHOLE TIME!

content_descriptors.notes:
・All characters are 18 years or older.
・The story, characters, and incidents in this game are fictitious.
・This game includes content such as Violence (Blood and Gore), Partial nudity (Suggestive sexual), Mature Humor, Substance Abuse, Strong Language, Self-harm, Suicide themes behavior. Not for sensitive viewers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: TO ESCAPE FROM THE WORLD OF GAL GAME, YOU MUST BE IN A RELATIONSHIP WITH YOUR CHILDHOOD FRIEND AND BEST FRIEND, MAYUMU.
supported_languages:
Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
